abstract: Returns the print formatters for a specified page.
overview:
## Return Value

An array of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintFormatter] objects. A print formatter can be an instance of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISimpleTextPrintFormatter], [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIMarkupTextPrintFormatter], or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIViewPrintFormatter].

## Discussion

A print formatter is associated with a starting page of printable content through the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintPageRenderer/addPrintFormatter(_:startingAtPageAt:)] method or the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintFormatter/startPage] property of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintFormatter]. The number of pages from that page is determined by the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintFormatter/pageCount] property, which [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintFormatter] computes based on layout metrics and content.

# printFormattersForPage(at:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the print formatters for a specified page.

## Declaration

```swift
func printFormattersForPage(at pageIndex: Int) -> [UIPrintFormatter]?
```

## Parameters

- **pageIndex**: The index of a page of printable content.

## Return Value

An array of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintFormatter] objects. A print formatter can be an instance of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISimpleTextPrintFormatter], [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIMarkupTextPrintFormatter], or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIViewPrintFormatter].

## Discussion

A print formatter is associated with a starting page of printable content through the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintPageRenderer/addPrintFormatter(_:startingAtPageAt:)] method or the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintFormatter/startPage] property of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintFormatter]. The number of pages from that page is determined by the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintFormatter/pageCount] property, which [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintFormatter] computes based on layout metrics and content.

## Managing print formatters

- **addPrintFormatter(_:startingAtPageAt:)**: Adds a print formatter to the page renderer starting at the specified page.
- **printFormatters**: The print formatters for the page renderer.
